text: The Blue Marble is a photograph of the Earth. It was made on December 2, 1972, by the crew of the Apollo 17 spacecraft. At that time they were on their way to the Moon at a distance of about from the Earth. It is one of the most reproduced images in human history. ==Related pages== * Earth phase * Extraterrestrial sky * Pale Orange Dot (Early Earth) * Spaceship Earth ==References== Category:Apollo program
title: The Blue Marble
